tool_description: This Sneaker SKU Database API allows users to get essential sneaker content such as images, product links from resell sites such as StockX, FlightClub, and Goat.
name: Sneaker SKU Database
title: Sneaker SKU Database

api_list.name: sku
api_list.description:
This API outputs a sneaker object of the following variables:
-Sneaker Name
Colorway
Description
Release Date
Retail Price
Style ID
Image Links
Product links from each of the resell sites
And more
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sneaker-sku-database1.p.rapidapi.com/sku/G54894"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sneaker-sku-database1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sneaker-sku-database1.p.rapidapi.com/sku/{sku}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sneaker-sku-database1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
